location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 14/1 V Conveyance of mails at Bahrain'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are file notes at the end of the file, on folios 47-55. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 58; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is also present in parallel between ff 2-46; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence with Yusuf bin Ahmed Kanoo, regarding the contract for conveyance of mail at Bahrain, and the cost of the service.The file also contains copies of agreements between the Political Agency and Yusuf bin Ahmed Kanoo (folios 4-7, 20-24, 37-40).
